item.description:
It supposed to be good weather this Saturday. I am planning to enjoy some fresh air at Blue Hills.

My plan is to start from Chickatawbut Overlook, taking yellow-dot trail to the red-dot trail, then take part of the skyline trail, and back onto yellow-dot path. It looks like 500 ft elevation gain, maybe 1 and 1/2 hour to 2 hours(?). Hoping to be done by noon.

Direction: I93-S. Take Exit 5B to merge onto MA-28 N/Randolph Ave toward Milton. Turn right at the Chickatawbut Rd. There is a parking right there, but not that one. Keep going up a little more, then you will find parking space at both sides of the road.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing Padres Baseball hat (Padres who?.... One from San Diego with "SD" on it)

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Last minutes Blue Hills Hike (moderate+)
